title: JSON schema for the cmake-tidy settings

succeeding_newlines.description: Describes the maximum number of succeeding newlines that can appear in formatted file

tabs_as_spaces.description: Indentation in the code should be done by spaces (True) or tabs (False)

tab_size.description: Size of one tab in spaces

force_command_lowercase.description: Convert all command invocations to lowercase eg. "SET()" to "set()"

space_between_command_and_begin_parenthe.description: Insert space between command name and begin parentheses eg. "if()" to "if ()"

line_length.description: Maximum line length that will not be splitted

wrap_short_invocations_to_single_line.description: Wrap multiline command invocations that fit into single line

closing_parentheses_in_newline_when_spli.description: Move closing parentheses of command invocation to new line when split

unquoted_uppercase_as_keyword.description: Treat unquoted uppercase arguments as keywords

keywords.description: Array of unquoted arguments to be treated as keywords
